name: Death, Soul & Robots
description:
In this captivating Metroidvania game you will take on the role of a cute kitty on its mission to find the soul of Planet 42 to rescue the Earth. Fight enemies and bosses, solve puzzles and explore levels in this fascinating game.

.

Along the way you will meet different characters, each with their own story to tell, and by the end you will be faced with a difficult moral choice

.

What's inside:
• 19 unique enemies
• 6 large biome maps to explore
• 6 challenging bosses
• 7 types of weapons
• various quests
• more than 10 characters, each with their own story.

.
